name: hexo-filter-typograf
description: Filtering hexo posts with JavaScript Typograf https://typograf.github.io. Very usefull for those Russians who love typography.
readme:
# hexo-filter-typograf

This a [Hexo](https://hexo.io/) plugin for running all your posts through the [Typograf](https://github.com/typograf/typograf).

No tests or config variables.
